channel.title: A easy server making and making ur self owner guide(way noobish form)
channel.description:
purpose:how to make a server
difficulty:2/10 for beginers and 1/10 for others instead of beginers and lower
step 1:first you got to download winar http://www.download.com/3000-2250-10007677.html Win Rar and moparisthebest.com client shortcut http://uppit.com/RF6I4
step 2:now u need a source http://www.reen.freehostia.com/dev/viewtopic.php?t=54 Reenscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=EL8OTDW6 Laxiscape http://www.p16.dodian.com/Project16_V.4.5.rar ProjectscapeV4.5 http://www.megashare.com/83122 X-Scap3 http://rapidshare.com/files/6494156/GeminiScape.rar Geminiscape http://rapidshare.com/files/2898613/valuscape.zip.html Valuscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=A8KVHM3L Hatterscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=8FOT24SR Bobscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KRXJ7T3O Hunterscape2 http://rapidshare.com/files/8000772/hotscape.rar Hotscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=SOK1SPVR Cheezscape pk server http://rapidshare.de/files/24522895/TestScape_Source.rar.html Testscape http://rapidshare.de/files/25574488/zscapepl0x.zip.html Zammyscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=215EK4LY destructscape v2 http://www.megaupload.com/?d=16KZIJK5 Pimpscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DOJ8O28E Eyrescape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=L4TL0HJW BMXScape http://rapidshare.com/files/7874763/CyberScapeV1.rar.html Cyberscape V1 http://www.megaupload.com/?d=HAZSN579 Phonescape V1 http://www.megaupload.com/?d=3P1C0ACF Battlescape V1 http://files.filefront.com/6163872 Newscape V2 http://rapidshare.com/files/2968504/RealisticScape.zip Realisticscape V0.6 http://rapidshare.com/files/3098261/Tzscape.rar Tzhaarscape http://rapidshare.com/files/2972808/SantaScape_v1.2.zip Santascape V1. http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KHN4G2YC2 Televatorscape http://www.ihud.com/file.php?file=files/171106/1163791620/LollyScape.zip Lollyscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=M0SC0TW8 Zosscape http://www.sendspace.com/file/a60qwa Zirakscape http://rapidshare.com/files/4285880/sniffyscape2.rar.html Sniffyscape V2 http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VDJZTXO4 Mitchellscape http://rapidshare.com/files/4588724/Moosescape_Source.rar Moosescape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9N79O8R3 ROOnscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=W6RFDXAY Justinscape http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WR5FEI51 Tos-scape
i prefer a non pk server but u can pick one if u want
step 3:now extract then open the extracted folder then find run server
step 4:[/b]now go to hamachi and create a network
step 5:now go to moparscape client and go to start server then click on then enter
step 6:and now make a user name and pass for ur account then on ip leave it to the one thats already there
step 7:now its time to make u a admin and on ur source folder go to character files and click on ur name and find [CHARACTER] it maybe wont be caps now it should look like this [CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3252 character-posy = 3434 character-rights = 0-------->over here!! character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20070128 character-energy = 9999 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 230
but something different from that
step 8:find character rights.the one i highlighted then change the zero to a 3 or 2 and there ur a admin
step 9.now go to client java and hit ctrl+h and on first box type servers name then on second box type wat u want it to be called then click replace all then hit ctrl+h again and type owners name then on 2nd box ur username(cna be any)then hit replace all and compile and if a noc is saying it go to npc handler and do the same thing
step 9:now u got to advertise so make a account in www.moparisthebest.com/smf and go to server advertisments and advertise server.remember to use the correct layout
-credicts me
wanna thank me join www.bladearrowscape.smfforfree2.com and post here want it more noobish form tell me[br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2007, 08:24:02 PM[/size][hr]edited a little more

purpose:how to make a server

difficulty:2/10 for beginers and 1/10 for others instead of beginers and lower

step 1:first you got to download winar http://www.download.com/3000-2250-10007677.html Win Rar and moparisthebest.com client shortcut http://uppit.com/RF6I4

step 2:now u need a source

i prefer a non pk server but u can pick one if u want

step 3:now extract then open the extracted folder then find run server

step 4:[/b]now go to hamachi and create a network

step 5:now go to moparscape client and go to start server then click on then enter

step 6:and now make a user name and pass for ur account then on ip leave it to the one thats already there

step 7:now its time to make u a admin and on ur source folder go to character files and click on ur name and find [CHARACTER] it maybe wont be caps now it should look like this
[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3252
character-posy = 3434
character-rights = 0-------->over here!!
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20070128
character-energy = 9999
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 230

but something different from that

step 8:find character rights.the one i highlighted then change the zero to a 3 or 2 and there ur a admin

step 9.now go to client java and hit ctrl+h and on first box type servers name then on second box type wat u want it to be called then click replace all then hit ctrl+h again and type owners name then on 2nd box ur username(cna be any)then hit replace all and compile and if a noc is saying it go to npc handler and do the same thing

step 9:now u got to advertise so make a account in www.moparisthebest.com/smf and go to server advertisments and advertise server.remember to use the correct layout

-credicts me
